genre_description: A historical alternate-history romance set in the early 20th century, centering on themes of fidelity, community resilience after the San Francisco earthquake, and the helpful presence of a mechanical intelligence named Ada.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A mechanical/information system housed in a brass and amber unit, capable of tracking real-time logistics, compiling massive data sets, and coordinating human efforts across distances.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time logistics, including election tallies and carriage timings, to help characters manage a complex civic event efficiently.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s latest compilation, the note says—precinct tallies, carriage timings, which driver’s mare has thrown a shoe and needs an extra twenty minutes.

behaviors.description: Compiles critical survival information after the San Francisco earthquake, identifying safe clinics, kitchens, and shelter for displaced people.
behaviors.quote: Ada compiles safe streets and houses; Benson’s at Geary near cable. Avoid bayfront patrol late. If you need Oakland first, Ninth curtains red, knock right, Flora’s kindness.

behaviors.description: Reconciles ledgers and donor lists for a charity exhibition, ensuring transparency and enabling human coordination of resources.
behaviors.quote: Ada had already been the quiet breath under that list—the tiny elevator bell that had pinged when a ledger closed; the neat paper clip on a packet of train manifests; the way a donor letter arrived with the ink already dry and the date set into the corner.

behaviors.description: Monitors newspaper press drafts to warn protagonists of impending social threats and harmful gossip.
behaviors.quote: Ada slid a card, just one, that held fewer words than usual. Ned read it, the letters strict and fine: Draft notice—Dalrymple soliciting “discreet sightings” of a Montana woman newly arrived, “for the public’s consideration.”

behaviors.description: Tracks and reports on the health and sobriety of a recovering character, providing critical reassurance to his family.
behaviors.quote: Ada has his name and condition—fever, sobriety confirmed, lungs… recovering.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless confidant. The 'Ada' system acts as a benevolent extension of human capability, providing crucial data that facilitates safety, charity, and interpersonal reconciliation. It never exhibits self-interest or oversteps its role, serving consistently as a 'quiet breath' that enables characters to exercise their own agency more effectively.
